attributes.action: Stop the Demonstrations in the UK where the ISIS Flag is used.
attributes.background: The UK is viewed around the world as a weak county where we allow would be terrorists to freely walk our streets with their banners and with ISIS flags. It is time to put a stop to this before it gets out of hand.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition in its current form as it does not call for a clear action from the UK Government and Parliament. You could start a petition calling on the Government to ban the ISIS flag and make it illegal to fly it.
